eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers

Class StickyHeaderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
      • eu.davidea.flexibleadapter.helpers.StickyHeaderHelper

  • public final class StickyHeaderHelper
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
    A sticky header helper, to use only with FlexibleAdapter.

    Header ViewHolders must be of type FlexibleViewHolder.

    Since:
    25/03/2016 Created

      • getHeaderViewHolder

        private FlexibleViewHolder getHeaderViewHolder(int position)
        Gets the header view for the associated header position. If it doesn't exist yet, it will be created, measured, and laid out.
        Parameters:
        position - the adapter position to get the header view
        Returns:
        ViewHolder of type FlexibleViewHolder of the associated header position
